message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. Given its features and value, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $8,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to that amount?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $8,000 is significantly below the value of this product.  To make a deal, I could come down to $13,000. This is my final offer.
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $12,500 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise between the value of the product and my budget.
